body.name: WOODBRIDGE One Piece Toilet with Soft Closing Seat, Chair Height, 1.28 GPF Dual, Water Sensed, 1000 Gram MaP Flushing Score Toilet with Matte Black Button T0001-MB, White
deliveryMessages: FREE scheduled delivery as soon as Saturday, February 24, 8 AM - 11 AM
features: ✅ [CHAIR HEIGHT DESIGN]:WOODBRIDGE chair height toilet not only meets ADA standards, must have a 17-19" floor to bowl rim height with seat included, but also offer more comfort to taller people and people who have a hard time getting up from a low seat.
✅ [EASY TO CLEAN DESIGN]: The skirted trap way creates a sleek look and makes cleaning easier. Compare to other toilets, it has no corners and grooves, very easy to reach for cleaning .

✅ [MATTE BLACK BUTTON]: A timeless, sophisticated and flattering Matte black-plated top button is included, the flat of matte black will bringing out the shimmer of brass and other metal and is perfectly pair with your home's existing classic or contemporary metalic elements.
✅ [QUITE & POWERFUL FLUSHING]: Siphon Flushing one piece toilet, Fully glazed flush system , bringing a super quiet and powerful flushing - NO clogs, NO leaks, and NO problem
✅ [Map Flush 1000 Grams]: Best Maximum Performance Flush score of 1000 grams. Highly Recommended Map Scoring Toilet
✅ [TOP QUALITY SEAT]:High end Soft Closing Toilet Seat with Stainless Steel Durable Seat Hinge, Easy to get the toilet seat off to tighten or clean after years of use.
✅ [LUXURIOUS MODERN DESIGN]:Luxurious Modern Design one piece toilet , Clean, sleek look and compliment with different styles like modern , craftsman , traditional and etc.

✅ [All-In -ONE PACKAGE]: Package Includes toilet, pre-installed soft closing toilet seat, pre-installed water fitting , high quality wax ring , floor bolts , and installation instruction, also Include special hand wrench tool to easily tighten the bolts in narrow spaces.

✅ [CERTIFICATIONS]: Meets US UPC & Canada CSA standard product, High-efficiency, WaterSense Certified toilet - meet or exceed ANSI Z124.1 & ANSI A112-19.7;Products approved and meet the Massachusetts Plumbing & Gas Code.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Was it harder to install than a standard toilet? Yes.Was it impossible to install? No.This thing is worth the little extra effort. Be sure to get a reusable ring, that way you will be able to have multiple attempts to set this correctly. It took a few tries but overall wasn't that bad to install. Looks great too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Modern look - easy install
reviews.reviewText: Love the look of this toilet. Very modern and can not beat the price.The bolts that were provided were too short and had to get longer ones (extra $6)With respect to the install its very easy but need someone's help.Also to lineup the opening at the bottom with the screws we used painters tape on the floor and the outside of the toilet so when yiu lift the toilet you can line them up and its a piece of cake.Keeo in mind to have enough side clearence (at least least 10 in.) so you can stick your hands from behind to tighten the bolts.Overall very easy just a little prep work and might need to buy lo ger bolts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful toilet, great quality, easy to clean and works perfectly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a very attractive toilet, though it is heavy and difficult to install. But about four months after I had it professionally installed it began leaking from underneath the base. Hundreds of dollars, three plumbers visits, and two reinstalls later it was still leaking. The plumber finally flipped it over and the interior portion was all wet and had what appeared to be multiple areas that had been patched/repaired and one of them was leaking. So beware!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 5, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I love the look! The slow close lid is awesome BUT the seat is somewhat cheaply made. So easy to clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quite and nice looking
reviews.reviewText: Just got it installed and everything is good so far. It’s very surprising quite. Bought the 2nd one for another bathroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I recommend this toilet
reviews.reviewText: VERY GOOD TOILET. LOOK BEATIFUL AND WORK GOOD.MUY BUEN TOILET MEJOR QUE UN TOTO DE $800.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Lids don’t properly fit and buttons are reversed
reviews.reviewText: As part of two bathroom renovations I did extensive research before selecting this toilet. I was so disappointed that the lid didn’t properly fit on either. We called product support and they asked us to email. We emailed and never heard back. We ended up having the plumber shave down the bowl to fit the lid. Also, the half flush is on the left, full flush on the right. One of the toilets is correct but the buttons are reversed on the other lid so you have to press the big button for the small flush and vice versa. You can’t flip the lid backwards, either. No support offered. Amazon offered us a discount, which we used to pay the plumber. We’re still stuck with reversed buttons. One toilet, fine, but 2? So disappointed. Based on this and lack of support, would not recommend- this toilet is heavy and hard to return. We’ve scheduled a return for one of them and the drivers won’t carry it back down the stairs where they delivered it. I’ve stayed home from work 3 times since I have to be here and it’s still on my porch.
